typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Model as string,
		Length as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SCD1Src
SCD1Src alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Model as string,
		Length as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ID'],
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['set identity_insert Cars on'],
	postSQLs:['set identity_insert Cars off'],
	mapColumn(
		ID,
		Name,
		Model,
		Length
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_container: 'adfdemoc',
	rejectedData_folderPath: 'EventtriggerOutput',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: true) ~> sink1
